title: Why do military jets fly so low (about 300 feet) over our home in south Hampstead at night?  We live only 1 mile from the coastline.  Wouldn\'t it be safer to fly over the ocean?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=2959 Regards, Vaughn Hagerty MyReporter.com Staff
